author: schor
msg: [UIMA-4020] redesign to make use of subtype classes for various alternative serialization techniques - plain, with indent and infoset support, and (separately) JSON.  As part of this remove no longer needed passing of contentHandler object through various calls.  As part of this, make various things public because the JSON support now in a separate project needs to reference these.
